SELECT u.username, ur.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON u.id = urm.user_id INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON urm.role_id = ur.id;

SELECT user_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM sessions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(session_id) > 3;
SELECT users.username, passwords.password_hash FROM users JOIN passwords ON users.id = passwords.user_id WHERE LENGTH(password_hash) > 50;
